svg.text: The default txt format uses only plain ASCII characters.
It is possible to use few extended Unicode characters to have a slightly better result.
or the utxt format in the ANT task.
They are two drawbacks of using utxt:
and sometimes this is an issue
The used font must have the used extended characters
You can even try complex example if you wish.
Is it ok\nwith a message that is\non several lines?
